ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Patch Message
ygData.msgSnippet: If Verant hands my friend a gas-powered chainsaw, gives me a rusty file, and tells us to go chop down some trees, I am quite willing to concede that the file
ygData.messageBody:
If Verant hands my friend a gas-powered chainsaw, gives me a rusty file, and tells us to go chop down some
trees, I am quite willing to concede that the file isn't useless, and I am more than smart enough to
figure out how to do things with it. I am even willing to admit that, when I succeed in chopping a tree
down that way, I'll be pretty darn proud of myself. That doesn't mean it's balanced.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 57 songs, Innoruuk



Jeffrey Sue wrote:

> At 11:11 PM 2/26/01 -0500, you wrote:
> >woah, that sure was a long thread that came from this. i figured it out
> >though, Whee. you just love to argue =P
>
> yeah i couldn't figure out how it got there either. but i was bored at work yesterday,
> and my pet peeve is when people can't figure out uses for things or ways to do things
> then blame verant for making a useless song/spell/item/game/etc.
